data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Pratapgarh.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pratapgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Pratapgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 3,173,800 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: the county of Pratapgarh has (about) 35,300 people who know Jesus, 38,937 people who know about him culturally, and 3,134,863 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, we ask for 641 new simple churches in the county of Pratapgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 3,209,100 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kol people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Pratapgarh.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 3,134,863, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary:
the county of Pratapgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 3,209,100.

We estimate Pratapgarh has 35,300 people who might know Jesus, 38,937 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,134,863 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Pratapgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
